stepAnswer: 30 pounds of $1.80 candy, 60 pounds of $1.20 candy
stepTitle: How many pounds of each type of candy should she use? Write the answer in the form "x pounds of $$\$1.80$$ candy, $$y$$ pounds of $$\$1.20$$ candy" without the quotes and with the appropriate values in the places of $$x$$ and $$y$$.
